doc:
Harp McGuire https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Harp_McGuire 0 Harp McGuire (1921–66) was an American actor who worked for a number of years in Australia, becoming very famous on Australian radio. He reached the height of his fame when he appeared as Randy Stone in the Australian adaptation of the NBC radio serial 'Night Beat' produced by Grace Gibson Radio Productions. Harp_McGuire ( 1921 – 66 ) was an_American_actor who worked for a_number of years in Australia , becoming very_famous on Australian_radio . He reached the_height of his_fame when he appeared as Randy_Stone in the_Australian_adaptation of the_NBC_radio_serial ' Night_Beat ' produced by Grace_Gibson_Radio_Productions .
